text: This is a list of airports in Rwanda, sorted by location. __TOC__ == List == Airport names shown in bold have scheduled commercial airline service. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%" |- valign=baseline ! style="text-align:left;" | City served ! style="text-align:left;" | Province ! style="text-align:left;" | ICAO ! style="text-align:left;" | IATA ! style="text-align:left;" | Airport name ! style="text-align:left;" | Coordinates |- valign=top | Nyamata | Eastern Province | n/a | n/a | Bugesera International Airport | |- valign=top | Butare | Southern Province | HRYI | BTQ | Butare Airport | |- valign=top | Cyangugu | Western Province | HRZA | KME | Kamembe International Airport | |- valign=top | Gisenyi | Western Province | HRYG | GYI | Gisenyi Airport | |- valign=top | Kigali | Kigali Province | HRYR | KGL | Kigali International Airport | |- valign=top | Nemba | Eastern Province | HRYN | n/a | Nemba Airport | |- valign=top | Ruhengeri | Northern Province | HRYU | RHG | Ruhengeri Airport | |} == See also == * Transport in Rwanda * Rwandan Air Force * List of airports by ICAO code: H#HR - Rwanda * Wikipedia: WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Africa#Rwanda == References == * * - includes IATA codes * Great Circle Mapper - reference for airport code and coordinates Rwanda Airports Airports Rwanda
title: List of airports in Rwanda
